name: Anthony Lawrence
biography:
Born in Melbourne in 1960, Anthony Lawrence spent his childhood building cubby-houses and catching tadpoles down the Moonee Ponds Creek.

As a teenager his interests included electronics, UFO's, martial arts, origami, film making and staying out of trouble.

In 1983 he completed his Bachelor of Education majoring in Film and Television.

In 1986 Anthony began specialising in stop motion puppet animation.

From: Artist's Homepage - http://home.mira.net/~plasmo
